LanguageData.RadAwayHigh.label: RadAway
LanguageData.RadAwayHigh.description: Due to the property of Antiradin to remove radiation from the body, when used, the level of radioactive contamination decreases.
LanguageData.RadAwayTolerance.label: Craving for Antiradin
LanguageData.RadAwayTolerance.description: A craving for Antiradin arose, and addiction is not far away
LanguageData.RadAwayAddiction.label: Addiction to Antiradin
